titleStmt.title: A vvoman forbidden to speak in the church the grounds examined, the mystery opened, the truth cleared, and the ignorance both of priests and people discovered / written by a friend of the truth whose name in the flesh is Richard Farnworth.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
